extendedInfo.description: Introducing Chimani's National Parks app! It contains details on 400 National Park Service units. Access daily national park news provided by National Park Traveler News (in-app purchase required). Create a passport of when you've visited any one of the National Park Service units - including each one of the 59 National Parks. View a Photo Gallery which includes 400 photos of each of the units. And much more! The key features of the app include the following: â Simple Interface - Interaction with the app using Chimani's unique interface based on universal national park symbols. â Passport Stamps - Record the years you've visit a National Park Service unit and create a "Someday/Maybe" list. â Someday/Maybe - Create a "Someday/Maybe" list of units and parks which you plan to visit!â News - Access daily national park news provided by National Park Traveler News website (in-app purchase required). â Search - Use the lighten-fast search engine to find anyone of the 400 units within the app. â Details - Learn about the rich history in each one of the National Park Service units (content provided by Wikipedia). â Location - View the location of each unit on interactive maps. *** This app requires an inital Internet connection to download photos (either Wifi or cellular). **** Chimani is the leading developer of mobile app to help you explore our National Parks. Learn more at: www.chimani.com

reviews.title: The map is great. Using it to make plans.
reviews.comment: Individual park info is great also. Would love to see information on passport stamps added.

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Good free app - lots of worthwhile information for all national parks.

reviews.title: It\'s pretty good
reviews.comment: Always uses my data connection even though i have notifications off, and i could mouth find a way to delete after having marked that i visited.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: I havent used it much yet but I\'m on a cross country bike trip, so I will. Thus far I love love love the map portion, but wish there was a search tool

reviews.title: Very limited.
reviews.comment: Not much information.  You would do much better with a simple google search rather than using this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Road Trips by Bob
reviews.comment: Found the access and information very helpful.during a 5277 mile road trip with my son. We collected 6 National Parks; 7 National forests and Mount Rushmore.  ..thanks :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SZ
reviews.comment: Very informative, especially about lesser known sites that are well worth visiting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: National Parks
reviews.comment: Having been raised not seeing anything cool as a kid, I\'m on a mission to see as many National Parks with my kids as I can. Just downloaded this app as we drive from MN to the Rocky Mtn NP. So far so good. Nice short, concise descriptions and good pictures. Can\'t wait to use it some more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great way to track your advertures
reviews.comment: Its like having a National Park passport on your tablet. Lots of useful information fun to track your visits to Americas National Treasures.
reviews.author: Michael Konkol

reviews.title: National park resource
reviews.comment: Great!
reviews.author: A Google User
